BFO_0000001 - entity
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Label

    entity

.. topic:: Definition

    The fundamental thing that has existence. All things that exist are entities.

.. topic:: Imported From

    http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/bfo/2020/bfo.owl
